Package org.daisy.streamline.api.media

Provides an API for media.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AnnotatedFile
    Provides an annotated file
    AnnotatedInputStream
    Provides an annotated resource.
    FileDetails
    Provides details regarding a file.
    FileSet
    Provides a file set.
    FileSetMakerService
    Provides an interface for a FileSetMaker service.
    FileSetProvider
    Provides an interface for creating a file set.
    InputStreamSupplier
    Provides an supplier of input streams for a resource.
    ModifiableFileSet
    Provides a modifiable file set.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseFolder
    Provides a location for a file set.
    DefaultAnnotatedFile
    Provides a default implementation of AnnotatedFile
    DefaultAnnotatedFile.Builder
    Provides a builder for an annotated file
    DefaultAnnotatedInputStream
    Provides a default implementation of AnnotatedInputStream.
    DefaultAnnotatedInputStream.Builder
    Provides a builder for DefaultAnnotatedInputStreams.
    DefaultFileDetails
    Provides a default implementation of FileDetails.
    DefaultFileDetails.Builder
    Provides a builder for DefaultFileDetails.
    DefaultFileSet
    Provides a default file set.
    DefaultFileSet.Builder
    Provides a builder of file sets.
    FileSetMaker
    Provides file identification based on its contents.
    FormatIdentifier
    Provides an identifier for a format.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    FileSetException
    Provides an exception for indicating an error in a file set.

Package org.daisy.streamline.api.media Description

Provides an API for media. A media is a file or a set of files combined with information about the file or file set that is important for automated processing, such as format name, typical file extension, media type and other properties.
